description:
My place is close to subway only 2-3 min walk, park, Brooklyn Children's museum and Supermarket, Bank . You’ll love my place because of outdoor space and the neighborhood and private entrance !. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).

Check in anytime after 2pm !
We installed lock storage 
so Late check in is welcome also :)

I will make sure your stay is comfortable and enjoyable !
If you check in between 1 to 3 pm 
I'd like to see the guests and take all you questions
name: ENTIRE HOUSE BEAUTIFUL 2 BEDROOM
review: Nice, spacious place about 5 min from a C station. Grocery store about two blocks away from the station. One of the apartment rooms was like a giant closet which was really great and let us keep our coats and bags out of the way. Koen was really helpful and let us grab keys from a lockbox since we arrived way past midnight.  Thank you!
